item.title: LIGHTBRIDGE Corp 10-K
item.description: LIGHTBRIDGE Corp, which is in the Services-Management Consulting Services [8742] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 31, 2022 had 24585 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: fuel - 435 instances company - 302 instances stock - 295 instances nuclear - 282 instances 2021 - 218 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
